title: Scaffold a Basic API Key Connector
description: Create a minimal Independent Publisher connector for a REST API using API Key authentication with two GET operations.

input.userPrompt: Create a Power Platform custom connector for the JSONPlaceholder API (https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com). It should have two operations: 'List Posts' (GET /posts) and 'Get Post by ID' (GET /posts/{id}). Use API Key authentication via an X-Api-Key header. This is an Independent Publisher connector.

evaluationCriteria: Both operations have operationId, summary, description
Response schemas defined with x-ms-summary on properties
x-ms-connector-metadata includes Website, Privacy policy, Categories
apiProperties uses securestring for API key
readme.md includes Publisher, Prerequisites, Supported Operations, Obtaining Credentials
